attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to propose a new prime minister is appointed in the short term.
Apart from party political views , our uk county is in dire staights, maybe broken up, from all sides  and cannot wait until a general election .Because of one man--.
1 month lost now will take 1 year to recover economically --active action on energy by means of organising tough oversight of fuel charges and the monopoly of 6 providers who are in cahoots --for example--

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
